CutSceneText.Text: The reason we battle in the Abyss
is to protect all of Elysea from the Asmodians and the Balaur.
We must seize the fortresses, and take the initiative in the Abyss.
Here in Reshanta, there are nine fortresses,
and each one has significant strategic value.
The closer to the center of Reshanta, the more crucial the fortress.
A Guardian General guards each fortress;
the map displays the general's location when he appears.
If your Legion defeats the Guardian General and captures the fortress,
a sum of Kinah, and the usual spoils of war...but of course...
...all of this is easier said than done.
As you well know, the Asmodian Archons are no pushovers,
and the Balaur Legions are quite formidable.
So lend us your strength until the day we capture the Asmodians' Primum Landing...
